title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4405.3 - Transfer of bets
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4405.3 - Transfer of bets

State Regulations
A branch office shall post conspicuously in the public
area notice of any cancellation of any race for which a corporation accepted
bets, or of any substitution of races. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4405.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
